name: The Best and Easiest Hummus Recipe
description: This is the BEST and EASIEST hummus recipe! With just 7 simple ingredients, you can have oh-so-creamy hummus in 5 minutes! No need to peel or boil chickpeas.
recipeIngredient: 15 ounce can chickpeas, drained and rinsed
1 clove garlic, or more to taste
chopped fresh parsley, cilantro or dill

recipeInstructions.text: To a food processor, add the drained and rinsed chickpeas, tahini, garlic, cumin, salt, lemon juice and 4 tablespoons of cold water.
recipeInstructions.name: To a food processor, add the drained and rinsed chickpeas, tahini, garlic, cumin, salt, lemon juice and 4 tablespoons of cold water.

recipeInstructions.text: Puree for about 4-5 minutes until smooth and creamy. If it's not quite creamy or too thick, add a few more tablespoons of cold water. This will help fluff it up and make it creamy and smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Puree for about 4-5 minutes until smooth and creamy. If it's not quite creamy or too thick, add a few more tablespoons of cold water. This will help fluff it up and make it creamy and smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Taste and season with additional salt, garlic, cumin or lemon juice if needed.
recipeInstructions.name: Taste and season with additional salt, garlic, cumin or lemon juice if needed.

recipeInstructions.text: Add to a bowl and garnish with toppings of choice. Serve with pita bread and veggie sticks or spread on toast, sandwiches, mix into pasta or use anywhere else you like. Enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Add to a bowl and garnish with toppings of choice. Serve with pita bread and veggie sticks or spread on toast, sandwiches, mix into pasta or use anywhere else you like. Enjoy!

keywords: easy hummus, hummus, hummus recipe, vegan hummus
